item.title: Git Basic
item.description: Problem Solving Authentication Clear saved account & password Error: fatal:Authentication failed for 'remote-url' git config --system --unset credential.helper Save account & password git config --global credential.helper store Remote Check remote url git remote -v Update remote url git remote set-url origin newRepoUrl
